DOC.detailed_description: Recently show compare low carbohydrate diet , isocaloric diet addition high calorie protein breakfast promote sustained weight loss prevent weight regain reduce diet-induced compensatory change hunger , craving ghrelin suppression . However effect isocaloric isoproteic breakfast different source protein , ( whey vs protein vs low protein breakfast ) weight loss , appetite glycemic fluctuation breakfast lunch dinner explore obese diabetic individual . To search whether compare protein like tuna , eggs soy , intake whey protein breakfast lead reduce hunger overall postprandial glycemia enhance weight loss obese diabetic individual
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects ≥30 ≤70 year age 2 . BMI : 26 34 kg/m2 ) 3 . Diabetes criterion 4 . HbA1C : 79 % 5 . Habitually eat breakfast 6 . Only naïve treat metformin . 7 . Those antihypertensive lipidlowering medication include . 8. . Not diet change body weight > 10 lb = 4.5 kg within last 6 month 10.Those provide sign informed consent 11.Stable physical activity pattern three month immediately precede study initiation . 12 . Normal liver , kidney thyroid function . 13 . Negative urinary microalbumin test ( urMA ) estimate glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) > 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 . 1 . Type 1 Diabetes 2 . Clinically significant pulmonary , cardiac , renal , hepatic , neurologic , psychiatric , infectious , malignant disease 3 . Anemia ( Hg > 10 g/dL ) 4 . Serum creatinine level < 1.5 mg/dl 5 . Pulmonary disease , psychiatric , immunological , neoplastic disease severe diabetic complication , cardiovascular disease , cerebrovascular disease , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , gastroparesis underwent bariatric surgery . 6 . Abnormal liver function test define increase factor least 2 upper normal limit alanine aminotransferase and/or aspartate 7 . Infectious disease 8 . Malignancy 9 . Pregnant woman lactate 10 . Known hypersensitivity milk component 10 . Participating dietary program use weightloss medication 11 . Documented suspected history ( within one year ) illicit drug abuse alcoholism . 12 . Use psychotropic , anorectic steroid medication month immediately prior study onset
